mapper.select: select r.name, c.id, c.seq from resident r, candidate c where r.id= c.id and c.seq =#{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into candidate( seq, id, job, gender, content ) values( #{seq}, #{id}, #{job}, #{gender}, #{content} )
